price: Sie flüstern einander zu: „Ihr habt nur zehn (Nächte) verweilt.
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
